short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically replace any words or texts with new texts on any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Text Replacer: Tame the Web, Unleash Creativity!

Transform your browsing with Auto Text Replacer! Go beyond blocking unwanted words and text - unlock a world of customization for both fun and productivity.

➤ Features:

📌 Effortless Text Replacement: Find and replace words with anything you desire.
📌 Always-On Filtering: Rules apply automatically, saving you time and frustration.
📌 Powerful Regex Support: Find and replace text using regular expressions for advanced control.
📌 Unlimited Rules: Craft personalized filters for targeted web experiences.
📌 Fine-tuned Control: Choose case sensitivity for precise replacements.
📌 Website Specific: Activate/deactivate on a website-by-website basis.

➤  New features:
v1.1.0 📌: April 20, 2024
🔎 Match and replace text using regular expressions.
v1.2.0 📌: August 20, 2024
💾 Export and import replacer items.
v1.2.1 📌: September 22, 2024
🔁 Replace placeholder values
v1.2.4 📌: November 20, 2024
🔛 Enable/disable single replacer items
✅ Fixed regular expression typing issue
💬 Show all replacer import errors

➤ Go Beyond Blocking:
📌 Boost Productivity: Replace distracting feature names with clear, actionable words.
📌 Inject Fun: Give websites playful makeovers with custom nicknames and inside jokes.
📌 Empower Creativity: Craft a personalized browsing environment that reflects your interests.

Never see a boring website again!
